title: Efficient Document Retrieval with RAG for GPT-3.5
description: This project explores using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to enhance document retrieval capabilities for GPT-3.5. RAG leverages a dual approach, combining information retrieval techniques with the powerful language generation of GPT-3.5.

title: LFW Face Recognition
description: Evaluation of SVM and kNN classifiers using different data representation methods on Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW) dataset.

title: PhotoHive - A Photo Gallery App
description: PhotoHive is a gallery app that allows users to upload, search, and manage photos using a serverless backend.
